channel.title: Can some1 please help me with this ERROR?
channel.description:
hey there , when i try to run my source i get this code :
[sup][2014-01-15 11:24]: Launching Exilium...Please wait. [2014-01-15 11:24]: Loaded 1023 doors in 50ms. [2014-01-15 11:24]: Loaded 273 Double doors in 10ms. [2014-01-15 11:24]: Exception in thread "main" [2014-01-15 11:24]: java.net.Bind Exception: Address already in use: bind [2014-01-15 11:24]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind0(Native Method) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Unknown Source) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [2014-01-15 11:24]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/sup]
can some1 help me?

item.title: Can some1 please help me with this ERROR?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Close all cmd’s or ide’s you were using with the server. Something is already bound to the ip address.

Read full topic
item.source: Can some1 please help me with this ERROR?

item.title: Can some1 please help me with this ERROR?
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“fuckyourself, post:3, topic:538648”][quote author=Docent link=topic=657480.msg4398325#msg4398325 date=1389798174]
Something is already using that IP
[/quote]

I love how it used to not happen to me but now it always happens and it used to work as when i started an update i would already have a new window open for fast updating do you know if there is anyway to fix it?[/quote]
Go to your IDE, open the Debug mode and end the task which is running your server. (Not sure if it exists in all IDE’s l0l), private message else if you still have problems.

Read full topic
item.source: Can some1 please help me with this ERROR?

item.title: Can some1 please help me with this ERROR?

item.description:
@fuckyourself wrote:

Something is already using that IP

I love how it used to not happen to me but now it always happens and it used to work as when i started an update i would already have a new window open for fast updating do you know if there is anyway to fix it?
